import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HomebtImg from "../../assets/homebotton.png"; import "./Check.css"; const Check = ({ pizza }) => { const [count, setCount] = useState(1); return (

Adicionar Outra Pizza

Banana ,Açúcar ,Muçarela, Banana , Açúcar ,Muçarela

{count}

ADICIONAR OUTRA PIZZA

FINALIZAR PEDIDO

VALOR TOTAL : 24 $R

PIZZA : 1

); }; export default Check;
